title: Get the details of a mentioned post from mentions webhook

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by TikTok Business Accounts. To obtain an access token, use /tt_user/oauth2/token/ .

parameters.name: business_id
parameters.description: Application specific unique identifier for the TikTok Business Account. You can get the ID through the open_id field returned by /tt_user/oauth2/token/ .

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: The ID of the post on which the comment was published. Pass the post ID as obtained from video_id within the content of the mentions webhook event .

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Requested fields. If fields is not set, only the default fields will be returned. Default value: ["item_id","caption"] . Supported fields : item_id : Unique identifier for the post. create_time : Unix/epoch date-time when the post was posted. video_link : A generic URL for the post. caption : The description for the post. likes : Total number of likes on the post. comments : Total number of comments on the post. shares : Total number of times the post has been shared. thumbnail_url : The URL of the post thumbnail. views : Total number of views the post has received. reach : Total number of unique viewers who viewed the post. creator_handle_name : The handle name of the creator who published the post.
